title: Permanently Banned
body:
Hey Riot, I got Permanently banned cause i flamed and i regret it so much...
Im Sorry For that and i want my account back and i promise i wont flame and Toxic anymore, i swear!
Please, Can u give my account back? I love to play league of legends! I have played it sense i was 8 years old.
So pleeaassee... Give my account back, Im gonna be so happy if u guys do that. and i** SWEAR **i wont Flame/Toxic!
^-^{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
If you got perma banned you must of been pretty damn toxic or you ignored the chat restrictions/temp bans you got.

Just create another account, level it up and learn from your mistakes. RIP skins tho.

[See this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070-My-Account-is-Suspended#h1q1) first. Might answer a few questions

You wouldn't of been perma-banned off one or two incidents, unless they were deemed excessive.

If you're really care about getting back onto your account, try submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see what can be done through the support team.



Hope this helps :)

> [{quoted}](name=ddddjo,realm=EUW,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=LjcU3T4k,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-27T14:17:01.820+0000)
>
> Do i care? no xD

So pleeaassee... Give my account back, Im gonna be so happy if u guys do that. and i SWEAR i wont Flame/Toxic!

Sure. Sure.
Unfortunately there's around a 99.99% chance you're not getting it back. Riot doesn't give second chances rip

Pretty sure the second chances come in the form of the escalating punishment system
1.  7 day chat restriction
2. 14 day chat restriction
3. 14 day ban
4. Permaban 

(of course you can skip the tiers of punishment, but if your behaviour is severe enough to do that (and you don't realise what you are doing is wrong) then you probably shouldn't get a second change anyway).
I was referring to after he gets perma banned there's no second chances but yeah
yeah making new accounts, they're fine with that
Doubt you got perma banned for being toxic
